title: Is taking notes during coaching classes beneficial or we should just study from textbooks and make our own notes out of them, rather than noting down coaching notes for clearing JEE? - Quora

response.answer_text: Taking notes during classes would be beneficial. You c do one thing also try to read what teacher is going to start in morning before the lecture and decide yourself during the class what to write and what not.
Before going to coaching class you should study on your own from coaching material or textbooks. Then you will know what to note down during the class.
